channel.title: Installation on Hugo Scenario-Based Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Installation on Hugo Scenario-Based Documentation

item.title: Install Hugo
item.description: Hugo extended edition is used for building a documentation website. In this example, Hugo is installed in C:\hugo\bin. Install Hugo using a prebuilt binary archive: Visit the Hugo latest release page. Scroll down to the Assets section. Find and download the hugo_extended archive for your operating system and architecture (for example, hugo_extended_0.111.3_windows-amd64.zip). Extract the archive. Move the executable (hugo.exe) to your desired directory (for example, C:\hugo\bin) Add this directory to the PATH environment variable.
